Package com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.service

Class FilterManager

java.lang.Object
com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.service.FilterManager
public class FilterManager extends Object
FilterManager class is used to handle the request body used by /stats and /filter endpoints.

The constructor checks if the entered values are valid, otherwise it stores an instance of a class which extends Exception inside the instance variable exception. Then the Controller checks if this variable is null or not.

Author:
Valerio Morelli

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterManager

      public FilterManager(String startDate, String endDate, MealType mealType, String foodName, Boolean water, AllNutrientNonNutrient[] nutrient_name)
      The constructor in charge of checking if the provided values are valid.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the left period range extremity.
      endDate - the right period range extremity.
      mealType - the type of meals in which the client is interested.
      foodName - the name of food to leave inside the diary.
      water - if the client wants to filter the information on his water assumption.
      nutrient_name - a list of nutrients to leave inside the diary.
